title: Ambush
description: You may use Cunning instead of Might when performing a Harm attack Action if your target is unaware of you. Your target is automatically aware of you after this action.

title: Apothekary
description: Choose two effects from those listed in the full talent description per rank. During downtime you may use a downtime Action to craft a potion or unguent with one of the effects which you can use at a later date.

title: Arcane Lore
description: Many animals and monsters that roam the world have organs that can be used to make potions or for other magical purposes. When you kill an animal or monster you know what part can be used for what purpose and can retrieve 1 dose or ammo load (depending on the creature) per rank in the Arcane Lore talent. A succesful Cool (Craft) roll may be required for some Arcane Lore concoctions. You can *invoke the Fates* on this roll as usual. More details are provided in the animal and monster descriptions.

title: Architect
description: When you are acting as an officer of the polis it has +1 Construction point for creating any new building works.

title: Artisan
description: During downtime you automatically gain a number of drakhmae equal to your Craft skill.

title: Assassin
description: If you succeed on a Harm attack Action using the Cunning characteristic your target doesn’t become aware of you and you remain hidden. The target is aware that something is amiss and may flee or begin searching for your character.

title: Assembly
description: During the council meeting in the agora phase you gain +1D on any Standing rolls you make.

title: Assistant
description: During the agora phase, on any one city skill check that is not using your skills you may add +1D to the dice pool.

title: Athlete
description: Once per session you may re-roll the failed dice on an Athletics or Accuracy skill check.

title: Basileus
description: When you are the Resources officer for the city you gain a +2D bonus to any skill checks using the Resources characteristic.

title: Beast Speech
description: You can understand the language of birds and animals although they can’t understand you. Roll Insight (Survival) to glean information that they may have witnessed in the last few hours.

title: Blessed Dark
description: You are blessed by the darkness of Persephone. You immediately gain Favour (Persephone).

title: Blessed Light
description: You are blessed by the light of Demeter. You immediately gain Favour (Demeter).

title: Blight
description: This Talent is identical to the Blight gift.

title: Bodyguard
description: When you’re carrying a shield and an ally at Melee or Short range to you is attacked you may use your Reaction to defend them with your Shield defence.

title: Bought and Paid For
description: You may spend 1 drakhma to gain an automatic success on any Diplomacy, Manipulation, Knowledge or Lore skill check. This is in addition to *invoking the Fates*.

title: Bountiful Harvest
description: This Talent is identical to the Bountiful Harvest gift.

title: Brace
description: When using a spear, javelin, or trident and an enemy takes a Move Maneuver to move into Melee range with you, you may use your Reaction to make an attack against them. This is resolved before their attack, if any.

title: Camouflage
description: When performing a Misdirect Action you may hide one willing ally who is within Melee range of you. They are immediately treated as hidden in the same way you are under the same conditions. This doesn’t use the character’s Action.

title: Catch Your Breath
description: When performing a Recovery Action at the end of an encounter reduce your Risk by an additional point per rank in Catch Your Breath.

title: Charge
description: You gain +2 damage when using the Melee skill to make a Harm attack Action as long as you have already made a Move Maneuver this turn.

title: Come and Get Them
description: When performing a Taunt Action you gain +2D to your dice pool. Successful Taunt Actions cause the target to gain 2 points of Risk instead of the usual 1. When using Taunt during a duel, the target doesn’t gain any Risk.

title: Commander
description: As an Action you may make a \*(Diplomacy: Leadership) skill check where * is a characteristic of your choice. A number of allies equal to the successes rolled within Short range may immediately gain 1 Risk to make a free Maneuver.

title: Concentrated Fire
description: As a Maneuver you may spend an ammo load and nominate a target. Anyone, including yourself, who attacks the target with a missile or thrown weapon gains a +1D bonus to their skill check. This bonus lasts until the beginning of your next turn.

title: Confidence
description: Whenever you need to roll Standing you gain +1D point per rank in Confidence. This doesn’t increase your base Standing, you are as rich or poor as you ever were, but your Standing in social encounters is improved.

title: Cunning Fighter
description: You gain +2D when using the Feint Action.

title: Deadeye
description: Whenever you make an Aim Maneuver you gain +2D instead of +1D. All other Aim rules apply.

title: Dedicated
description: Permanently increase a characteristic of your choice by 1 point to a maximum of 5. This talent may be bought multiple times.

title: Demarkhos
description: When you are the Produce officer for the city you gain a +2D bonus to any skill checks using the Produce characteristic.

title: Diplomat
description: When you are the Trade officer for the city you gain a +2D bonus to any skill checks using the Trade characteristic and +1D to any Resources roll to gain a new Trade route.

title: Dirty Fighting
description: After you succeed on a Pin attack Action using Brawl or a Grapple Action you may use your Reaction to immediately make an unarmed Harm attack Action or a Strike Action.

title: Divine Healer
description: This Talent is identical to the Divine Healer gift.

title: Divine Shot
description: You may spend an ammo load or destroy a thrown weapon to attack a target one range band further than maximum range.

title: Dodge
description: You gain a Dodge defence equal to ranks in the Dodge talent. This can be used as a Reaction to defend against a ranged or melee attack and works the same as Shield defence.

title: Enduring
description: Permanently increase your base Endurance by 1 point. This talent may be bought multiple times.

title: Epic
description:
During downtime you may use a downtime Action to create an epic tale of the adventures of you and your companions. Make an Insight (Perform) skill check and write the number of successes on your character sheet. The quality of your writing inspires you all to even greater deeds.

Between now and the next downtime phase you can spend one or more of your Epic successes as an Incidental to give yourself or another PC +1D per success spent on their next skill check. If you give more than 1D on a single skill check you gain 1 Hubris. At the start of the next downtime any remaining Epic successes are lost.

title: Fine Workmanship
description: When you craft an item during Downtime you can *invoke the Fates* to add either the Fine 1 or Rich 1 properties.

title: From Distant Shores
description: During downtime you may use a downtime Action to attempt to purchase an item of any Availability.

title: God-like Gifts
description:
When you gain a rank in this talent you gain one of the following gifts:

- Fawning
- Fearsome
- Oracle

Each Gift can only be taken once. All of the rules for the gift apply.

title: Gossip
description: During a social encounter you may make an Insight (Manipulation) roll with a Difficulty equal to the target’s Diplomacy skill to uncover one secret about them.

title: Grappler
description: When performing a Pin attack Action using the Brawl skill or a Grapple Action gain +1D per rank in the Grappler talent.

title: Healer
description: After making a successful First Aid Action you may reduce the value of the treated Wound by 1 per rank in the Healer talent. If this reduces the Wound to a value of 0 it is removed.

title: Herbalist
description: You may spend a dose from your herbalist’s bag to gain a success on a Craft skill check to create an unguent or potion.

title: Honoured
description: You are known and honoured wherever you go. You are always able to meet the local ruler or council when you arrive in a new city.

title: Inspiring
description: When you succeed on a Recovery action your allies, inspired by your greatness, reduce their Risk by an additional point per rank in the Inspiring talent.

title: Khoregos
description: When you are the Culture officer for the city you gain a +2D bonus to any skill checks using the Culture characteristic.

title: Know Your Enemy
description: You gain +2D when using the Observe Action. In addition, you can perform an Observe Action as a Maneuver on your first turn during combat outside of the games.

title: Lampoon
description: As an Action make an Insight (Perform) skill check. If successful, a number of enemies equal to the successes rolled within Short range increase their Risk by 1 per rank in the Lampoon talent.

title: Living Off the Land
description: During downtime you automatically gain a number of drakhmae equal to your Survival skill.

title: Living Ward
description: The rites ward you from the touch of death and evil magics used against you. All magic cast against you has its Difficulty increased by 1 along with all attacks from dead creatures and spirits.

title: Long Shot
description: You may reduce the penalty applied to an Accuracy skill attack due to range by 1D per rank.

title: Mageia
description: Choose one magical effect from those listed in the full talent description per rank in this talent. As an Action you may make a Hubris (Lore) roll to activate the effect.

title: Maker
description: During downtime you may use a downtime Action to craft any item of any Availability as long as you have held an item like it in the past. This requires a successful Cool (Craft) skill check with a Difficulty of 0 for Common items, 1 for Uncommon, and 2 for Rare.

title: Merchant
description: During downtime you automatically gain a number of drakhmae equal to your Diplomacy skill plus 1 per rank in the Merchant talent.

title: Mighty Blow
description: When making an attack using the Brawl skill you do +1 damage. This applies to Harm, Jab, or Strike Actions.

title: Motivate
description: As an Action make a Cool (Perform) skill check. If successful, a number of allies equal to the successes rolled within Short range may reduce their Risk by 1 per rank in the Motivate talent.

title: Mythic
description: When you use your Epic talent to give successes to a PC, write down how many successes you give them. When it reaches 5, reset the number of successes to 0 and give them 1 Glory.

title: Necromancer
description: You are able to commune with the spirits of the dead and gain the Necromancy magic outlined in the Mageia talent.

title: Officer
description: When acting as an officer of the polis you gain +1D per rank in the Officer talent when using the city characteristic you were elected to.

title: Organised
description: Increase the number of doses in your herbalists bag by 1 per rank in the Organised talent.

title: Performer
description: During downtime you automatically gain a number of drakhmae equal to your Perform skill.

title: Phalanx
description: When using a shield it gains +1 to its Shield rating.

title: Pharmakeia
description: You may spend a dose from your herbalist’s bag to gain a success on a Medicine skill check.

title: Physician
description: During downtime you automatically gain a number of drakhmae equal to your Medicine skill.

title: Popular
description: You are well loved in your polis and it gains +1 Morale whenever you gain this talent. If you run for office during the agora phase you gain +1D on your Standing roll per rank in the Popular talent.

title: Pressure Point
description: When making a successful unarmed attack with the Brawl skill you may *invoke the Fates* to add your Medicine skill to the damage. This applies to Harm, Jab, or Strike Actions.

title: Public Speaker
description: The range of the Commander, Lampoon and Motivate talents is increased to Medium. You suffer no penalty for using these talents at Medium range.

title: Retort
description: Your Lampoon action gains the Stun quality which can be activated by *invoking the Fates*.

title: Riposte
description: Whenever you use a weapon Parry and your attacker fails in their attack they gain 1 Risk per rank in the Riposte talent.

title: Scarred
description: You gain +1D to any rolls involving intimidation or coercion but -1D on any rolls to charm per rank in the Scarred talent.

title: Shield Bash
description: When you’re carrying a shield you may use your Reaction to attack an enemy at Melee range with it, after they have made an attack.

title: Shield Master
description: Once per round you may use your Reaction with your Shield defence, Bodyguard, or Shield Bash talents for free.

title: Silver Tongued
description: Once per session you may re-roll the failed dice on a Diplomacy or Manipulation skill check.

title: Skirmisher
description: When performing a Disengage Action you gain +2D on your dice pool.

title: Sophist
description: You may use the Knowledge skill in place of the Manipulation skill to convince others of the logic of your argument.

title: Spear Reach
description: When using a spear, javelin, or trident, your weapon Reach is 3 or 4, whichever is best for you.

title: Staggering Blow
description: When making an attack using the Brawl skill your strike gains the Stagger property. This applies to Harm, Jab, or Strike Actions.

title: Strategos
description: When you are the Military officer for the city you gain a +2D bonus to any skill checks using the Military characteristic.

title: Stunning Blow
description: When making an attack using the Brawl skill your strike gains the Stun property. This applies to Harm, Jab, or Strike Actions.

title: Sure Footed
description: When moving through difficult terrain you may ignore up to -1D penalties per rank in Sure Footed.

title: Toughened
description: Your experience has toughened and hardened you making you less sensitive to cuts and scrapes. You gain a natural Armour rating of 1 per rank in Toughened.

title: Trader
description: During the trading section of the agora phase you may spend 10 drakhmae for the polis to gain 1 Stater.

title: Traveller
description: Sleeping overnight in the wilderness or at sea counts as a good night’s rest for you and allows you to completely remove any Risk you may have gained.

title: Trusted
description: Everyone knows you and trusts your judgement. You gain +1D to all rolls to convince someone of the truth per rank in the Trusted talent.

title: Unfeeling
description: You are inured to pain. When rolling on the Critical Injury table reduce the roll by 1 per rank in the Unfeeling talent.

title: Voice of the People
description: During the agora phase when electing officers you may add +2D to any one voting roll to sway the council in your favour. This can be on your behalf, for another PC, or for the Arkhon, at your discretion.

title: Volley
description: After making a successful ranged attack with a sling or bow you may use a Reaction to spend an ammo load to make an additional attack with the same dice pool.

title: Well Travelled
description: Once per session, when entering a new city or region you may declare that you have a contact there. The contact is friendly to you but you owe them a favour. Decide with the GM who the contact is and add them as a positive relationship to your character sheet.
